introZh: 聚焦低光环境下的图像增强，构建自适应照度建模与噪声抑制方案，让真实场景在暗光中依旧保持细节与自然色彩。
introEn: Focus on low-light image enhancement by modeling illumination adaptively and suppressing noise, so real-world scenes retain details and natural colors even in darkness.

introZh: 聚焦去反射、去阴影、去雨/去雪与真实场景超分等任务，构建端到端恢复框架与工具箱（如 XReflection），保障真实应用的稳定输出。
introEn: Build end-to-end restoration frameworks and toolkits (e.g., XReflection) for reflection, shadow, rain/snow removal, and real-world super-resolution, covering data curation, training pipelines, and deployment-ready inference to ensure stable output.

introZh: 面向跨域目标检测与语义分割，探索鲁棒特征对齐、时空特征聚合与轻量化推理策略，支撑城市与工业场景的实时智能感知。
introEn: Tackle cross-domain detection and semantic segmentation via robust feature alignment, spatiotemporal aggregation, and lightweight inference to empower real-time perception in urban and industrial settings.
